summary: Web encompasses the digital landscape of the internet, focusing on its evolution, fragmentation, and interconnected nature. It explores how the online world mirrors physical space, with concepts like ecosystem architecture viewing digital environments as complex systems. This area examines the challenges and opportunities presented by internet fragmentation, encouraging innovation and diversity within the digital realm. It covers topics related to technology, digital trends, and the ever-changing nature of our online experiences.
excerpt: The internet has fragmented like tectonic shifts, mimicking physical space. Ecosystem architecture views digital landscapes as complex systems, embracing fragmentation for innovation. The article explores types of fragmentation, historical context, and perspectives on this phenomenon.
